item.title: Paleografia Quantitativa Norditalica (PQN): Massing some evidence, Missing some conference
item.description: The collective GEAS project called PQN (Paleografia Quantitativa Norditalica) depicts every single graphic shape of the Lepontic/Brembonic/Cisalpine-Celtic, Raetic/Camunic, and Etruscan/Lemnic sub-alphabets…. and the Elder Futhark. The decision to include Germanic writing will potentially lead the Runenherkunft question to unexplored terrain.
